info.description:
=======================================
Package piCM15 - PimucHA - Version 0.10.x
=======================================


Overview:
---------

piCM15 : PimucHA for X10 CM15A controller

PimucHA
Python integrated multi controllers Home Automation



Requirements:
-------------

- Python version 2.7.x
- Python version 3.4.x

- pyUSB version 1.0.x
- libUSB version 1.0.x

- Optionnal : Python - APScheduler version 3.2




Installation and usages :
-------------------------

- See http://domolinx10.free.fr/wiki/tiki-index.php?page=piCM15
info.name: picm15
info.summary: pimucHA for X10 CM15a CM15pro controller
